ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
numpy:
- '2'
perl:
- 5.32.1
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.summary: Python bindings for the PVAccess network client and server.
Python bindings for the PVAccess network client and server.

name: p4p

about.summary: Python bindings for the PVAccess network client and server.
Python bindings for the PVAccess network client and server.

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: p4p
  version: "4.2.2"

package:
  name: ${{ name }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  - url: https://github.com/epics-base/${{ name }}/archive/refs/tags/${{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 523ff81fcb5b163602e50211d14f1402a941a5b2a628a6de00c5882a7e6b78b5
    patches:
      - patch/fix_sys_libs.patch
      - patch/update_setup_config.patch
      - patch/remove_pvxslibs.patch
  - path: src

build:
  number: 1
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --ignore-installed
  python:
    entry_points:
      - pvagw = p4p.gw:main

requirements:
  build:
    - make
    - perl
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - cython
        - numpy
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools
    - setuptools_dso
    - cython
    - numpy
    - ply
    - pvxs
    - epics-base
  run:
    - python
    - numpy
    - ply
    - pvxs
    - epics-base

tests:
  - script:
      - pvagw --help
      - python -m p4p.client.cli -h
  - python:
      imports:
        - p4p
        - p4p.client.thread
        - p4p.server

about:
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Python bindings for the PVAccess network client and server.
  homepage: https://github.com/epics-base/p4p
  repository: https://github.com/epics-base/p4p
  documentation: https://epics-base.github.io/p4p/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - anderslindho
    - simon-ess
    - valmar
    - chrisvam
    - klauer

about.summary: Python bindings for the PVAccess network client and server.
